Package io.github.moctave.weftspace

Class Builder

java.lang.Object
io.github.moctave.weftspace.Builder
public abstract class Builder extends Object
A class of utility methods designed to allow easy conversion from nodes to objects.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    Builder.DoubleType
    An enum storing a list of potential double types, for use in buildDouble(DataNode, int, String, DoubleType).
    static enum 
    Builder.IntType
    An enum storing a list of potential integer types, for use in buildInt(DataNode, int, String, IntType).

  • Method Details

    • buildString

      public static String buildString(DataNode node, int arg, String context)
      Takes an argument from a node and returns it as a string, handling any exceptions that occur.
      Parameters:
      node - The node to access.
      arg - The index of the argument to convert.
      context - The name of the object being made from the node.
      Returns:
      The argument, as a string.

    • buildInt

      public static int buildInt(DataNode node, int arg, String context)
      Takes an argument from a node and returns it as an integer, handling any exceptions that occur.
      Parameters:
      node - The node to access.
      arg - The index of the argument to convert.
      context - The name of the object being made from the node.
      Returns:
      The argument, as a integer.

    • buildInt

      public static int buildInt(DataNode node, int arg, String context, Builder.IntType type)
      Takes an argument from a node and returns it as an integer. The special type of the value may be defined; this will have no impact on the value returned by this method, but it will cause a warning to be thrown if the final value does not conform to the intended pattern.
      Parameters:
      node - The node to access.
      arg - The index of the argument to convert.
      context - The name of the object being made from the node.
      type - The intended type of value to be returned. If the final value does not match, a warning will be thrown.
      Returns:
      The argument, as a integer.

    • buildDouble

      public static double buildDouble(DataNode node, int arg, String context)
      Takes an argument from a node and returns it as a double, handling any exceptions that occur.
      Parameters:
      node - The node to access.
      arg - The index of the argument to convert.
      context - The name of the object being made from the node.
      Returns:
      The argument, as a double.

    • buildDouble

      public static double buildDouble(DataNode node, int arg, String context, Builder.DoubleType type)
      Takes an argument from a node and returns it as an double. The special type of the value may be defined; this will have no impact on the value returned by this method, but it will cause a warning to be thrown if the final value does not conform to the intended pattern.
      Parameters:
      node - The node to access.
      arg - The index of the argument to convert.
      context - The name of the object being made from the node.
      type - The intended type of value to be returned. If the final value does not match, a warning will be thrown.
      Returns:
      The argument, as a double.

    • buildlong

      public static long buildlong(DataNode node, int arg, String context)
      Takes an argument from a node and returns it as a long int, handling any exceptions that occur.
      Parameters:
      node - The node to access.
      arg - The index of the argument to convert.
      context - The name of the object being made from the node.
      Returns:
      The argument, as a long int.

    • search

      public static DataNode search(DataNode node, DataNode scope, String context)
      Takes a node and uses it as a key to search the scope for a node with a matching name and first argument, handling any exceptions that occur.
      Parameters:
      node - The node to use as a search key.
      scope - The node whose children should be searched.
      context - The name of the object being made from the node.
      Returns:
      The node with the same name, or null if none exist.
